resources.string: Your login credentials will only be used to login to Quest. For security concerns they will not be stored, you will have to re-enter your credentials each time.

Your password will not be stored in any persistent storage. Please keep this app running in the background. The app will try to pull your grades and check for an update every 30 minutes. You will be notified to re-login if you or the system killed the app - in which the password will be lost. If you are done with the grades please click stop notification to turn off the service and save some battery.
